page.title: /ideas
page.description: Project ideas and things I want to build
page.content:
Ideas

Projects I Want to Build

A collection of ideas I'm thinking about. Some of these might happen, many won't.

Active Ideas

Projects I'm actively considering or working on: (I'll be purposly vague, if you want to kknow more reach out)

  • Idea 1: A way to manage and extend a LEGO collection;
  • Idea 2: Preserve the retrogaming history for future generations to experince;
  • Idea 3: Make the F1 Nerd GP viewing experience more engaging.

Someday/Maybe

Ideas that sound cool but are on the back burner:

  • Make people more aware of their health trough development a proper PHR.
  • Use AI technology to help athletes improve faster even when they lack access to expensive training.

Looking for Collaborators

If any of these interest you and you want to collaborate, reach out!
